text: this is what comes in the email
at least thats what i am seeing on the dev info for a page

<@UAXL2G8NL> {{ page_by_id(item.link.link_page)|pprint }} in a custom module outputs all of the developer info for that page, including the modules. You might be able to follow the tree to what you are wanting.
page_by_id is a custom module field btw.
